info.name: Dark Minimal facebook - Sep/2015 UPDATE
info.description:
Original credit to Skalude
a really old dark theme that's been updated to use new facebook layout.
info.additionalInfo:
I've basically rewritten the entire thing for 2015, also added some comments to the source so it's easier to modify and maintain.

currently the only *supported* page is the newsfeed, profiles will be worked on next.
